title: 30 minute queue dodge timer after dodging thanks to trolls in champ select
body: I dodged because 2 of them were trolling and saying they were inting and I just wasn't having it but then I got bamboozled when riot hit me with that 30-minute wait. Feelsbadman but the amount of toxicity I still run into in this game is insane it really is annoying because ranked games are just teammates fighting each other over the stupidest things.

replies.body: You pretty much get 1 semi-free dodge (6 minutes and -3lp for ranked) a day. If dodging was free or cheap no-one would ever get into a game, especially in ranked. Dodges are a strategic tool but Riot also have to prevent overuse and abuse of them to maintain queue and game health.

I have this thing called "other things in my life".
I can dodge and just play guitar or do something else for a while, it's called having a life.
